FacilityConfigPage.deviceManagementDescr: This 4-digit PIN allows users to manage content and other settings on learn-only devices

FacilityConfigPage.saveFailure: There was a problem saving your settings

GettingStartedFormAlt.descriptionParagra: In Kolibri, you can use a facility to manage a large group of users, like a school, an educational program or any other group learning setting. You can also have multiple facilities on the same device.
Would you like to configure a facility?
GettingStartedFormAlt.gettingStartedHead: How do you plan to use Kolibri?
IdentifierTextbox.label: Identifier (Optional)
ImportInterface.editCSV: Edit user info using an external spreadsheet program
ImportInterface.exportCSV: Export a CSV file which contains all users, and the classes that they are associated with
ImportInterface.importCSV: Import a CSV file to create and update users
ImportInterface.sectionDescription: You can manage, import and export many users and classes at once:
Init.beforeCommitting: Before committing the import you will be shown a summary of changes that will be made.
Init.caution: CAUTION: importing from CSV will make many changes to your users and classes, and these changes cannot be easily reverted.
Init.importL2: update existing users (for users with matching usernames)
Init.importL3: set which classes each learner is enrolled in
Init.importL4: set which classes each coach is assigned to
Init.importL5: create new classes (for any referenced class names that do not yet exist)
Init.introduction: When importing from a spreadsheet you can create, update, and optionally delete dozens or hundreds of facility users at a time by loading new information from comma-separated-value (CSV) files.
Init.labelDelete: Also delete users and classes not in CSV
Init.optionally: Optionally, you can also delete users and classes that are not referenced in the spreadsheet.
Init.proceed: To proceed, select a CSV file:
LearnMoreModal.sessionLogText: When a user views a resource, we record how long they spend and the progress they make. Each row in this file records a single visit a user made to a specific resource. This includes anonymous usage, when no user is signed in.
LearnMoreModal.summaryLogText: A user may visit the same resource multiple times. This file records the total time and progress each user has achieved for each resource, summarized across possibly more than one visit. Anonymous usage is not included.
LearnerClassEnrollmentPage.pageSubheader: Only showing learners that are not enrolled in this class
ManageSyncSchedule.introduction: Set a schedule for Kolibri to automatically sync with other Kolibri devices sharing this facility. Devices with the same sync schedule will be synced one at a time.
PaginationActions.pagination: { visibleStartRange, number } - { visibleEndRange, number } of { numFilteredItems, number }
Preview.importError: Importing is not possible due to the following errors:

Preview.summary: Summary of changes if you choose to import:
PrivacyModal.privacyText: By syncing this facility with the Kolibri Data Portal, you are granting access to your data to organization admins on Kolibri Data Portal. It will be uploaded to cloud servers operated by Learning Equality, who will also have access to this data.
